about_the_game:
Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, '80s supercars speeding down an endless highway... Welcome to the world of Retrowave!

Listening to Synthwave / Retrowave most people have had this feeling of nostalgia for an era they didn't know or that never existed.
The Retrowave is very much inspired by the '80s, but is mostly an idealized futuristic version of the '80s.

This game offers the player the unique experience of being immersed in this wonderful world for at least a few moments...

Retrowave offers above all a visual and sound experience that will delight fans of the genre and will surely make those who don't know it yet discover this wonderful universe...

This is only a demo of the game, the full description of the game is available on the Retrowave 2 Steam page

Features of the DEMO:

🌴 The timeless Falcon 40 car !
🌴 3 different universes!
🌴 4 different game modes!
🌴 A unique retro-futuristic atmosphere!
🌴 More than 50 different synthwave music!
🌴 New infinite road system with curves!
🌴 Addictive gameplay!
🌴 Pure nostalgia!
